channel.title: Fake News on Praveen Lobo
channel.description: Recent content in Fake News on Praveen Lobo

item.title: Sometimes you have to talk politics with friends
item.description: ::backstory Just because you do not take an interest in politics doesn’t mean politics won’t take an interest in you. Pericles :: Petrol has gone up image reporduced wihtout names [9:14 AM, 5/24/2018] Praveen Lobo: Little does he know that ancient India had aircrafts that didn’t even need petrol. Our PM is digging to find more evidence. ðŸ˜œ [9:15 AM, 5/24/2018] Praveen Lobo: Also, no links. No timestamp. Looks like subtle propoganda for 2019.
